videos.title: Introduction to Web Development
videos.description: Learn the basics of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Perfect for beginners who want to start their journey in web development.

videos.title: JavaScript Fundamentals Explained
videos.description: Deep dive into JavaScript fundamentals. Covering variables, functions, objects, and ES6 features.

videos.title: CSS Grid Layout Tutorial
videos.description: Master CSS Grid layout with practical examples. Learn how to create responsive layouts easily.

videos.title: React Hooks Complete Guide
videos.description: Complete guide to React Hooks. Learn useState, useEffect, useContext, and custom hooks.

videos.title: Node.js Backend Development
videos.description: Build RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express. Learn server-side development from scratch.

videos.title: Python for Data Science
videos.description: Introduction to Python for data science. Learn pandas, numpy, and matplotlib.

videos.title: Vue.js 3 Composition API
videos.description: Learn Vue.js 3 Composition API. Modern approach to building Vue applications.

videos.title: TypeScript Basics
videos.description: Get started with TypeScript. Learn type annotations, interfaces, and generics.

comments.author: John Doe
comments.text: Great tutorial! Very helpful for beginners.

comments.author: Mike Johnson
comments.text: This helped me understand closures better.
